document.full_text: the longtime superintendent of the beaumont school district has in several ways turned the district around, but his high salary and the district's uses of a bond issue are drawing criticism.
document.title: the texas tribune: deep rift in beaumont on school administration
lines_and_colors: the longtime superintendent of the beaumont school district has in several ways turned the district around, but his high salary and the district's uses of a bond issue are drawing criticism.
